task: Develop a basic 'Monopoly' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Into the impossible'.
name: Monopoly: Beyond Limits

branding_data.short_description: Monopoly: Beyond Limits takes the classic board game into uncharted territories, challenging players to venture into the impossible with new rules and unpredictable twists.
branding_data.detailed_description: Monopoly: Beyond Limits is a reimagined version of the beloved classic board game, Monopoly. By applying the oblique strategy 'Into the impossible', this game introduces players to an unpredictable and adventurous experience. In addition to the traditional buying, selling, and trading of properties, players must navigate through fantastical scenarios and unforeseen events that defy conventional gameplay. With new chance cards that can drastically alter the state of the game and properties that can change locations, players must think creatively and adapt quickly to succeed. Monopoly: Beyond Limits invites you to step beyond the ordinary and embrace the impossible.
